>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.LdYGqI7hDPc9JU4H]{Law Officer}

You are comfortable among those you serve and protect. You know how to communicate to large groups of people, navigate a crowd, and redirect individuals within a crowd to allow yourself more freedom of movement. You can move through the spaces of creatures that are not hostile to you. If crowding creatures create difficult terrain that would reduce your speed or require you to squeeze, you can still move your normal speed. In addition, when you attempt to use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#change-attitude]{change the attitude} of a group of creatures that is not already hostile toward you, lower the DC by 5.
